name: realme Buds Air 3 RMA2105 TWS Earbuds

prod_desc.heading: Why Buy Realme Buds Air 3 In-Ear Active Noise Cancellation Truly Wireless Earbuds with Mic
features: Long-lasting battery will keep you entertained for up to 30 hours in normal mode
42 dB active noise cancellation technology eliminates the background noise for an immersive listening experience
Boasting IPX5-water resistance, these earbuds won't be damaged by drizzles or water splashes
sub_features: Whether you’re working out, traveling, or just chilling at home on a weekend, the right kind of earbuds helps you zone out and listen to your favorite music or podcasts. If you’re looking for a truly wireless experience, there’s none better than the Realme Buds Air 3 In-Ear Active Noise Cancellation Truly Wireless Earbuds with Mic. Whether you want to watch your favorite movies on the go or enjoy listening to your playlist during intense workout sessions, the realme Buds Air 3 Earbuds are an ideal choice. Featuring Smart Wear Detection technology, these earbuds identify when you are wearing them and instantly pause music when you remove them from your ears. In addition, these earbuds enable you to manage your music or take a call while on the go, thanks to their advanced touch controls. Whether you want to watch TV or listen to your playlist, these earbuds with their long-lasting battery will keep you entertained for up to 30 hours in normal mode. And, they feature fast charging, which allows for up to 100 minutes of playing after only 10 minutes of charging, eliminating the need to wait for long. So, you can enjoy listening to your favorite tracks all day long. Thanks to its 42 dB active noise cancellation technology, these earbuds eliminate the background noise for an immersive listening experience. So, whether you're on a plane, walking through the city, or working in a busy workplace, you can listen to rich music without any distractions.

Coming in a gorgeous design and bright color, the Realme Buds Air 3 In-Ear Active Noise Cancellation Truly Wireless Earbuds with Mic’s price is quite reasonable. The realme Buds Air 3 Earbuds are integrated with Smart Wear Detection technology, which detects when you are wearing them in real-time and automatically pauses music when you remove them from your ears. Thanks to their sophisticated touch controls, these earbuds let you manage your music or attend a call while on the move. You can pick up a call or play/pause music by double-tapping a bud. And, you can triple-tap to go to the next track. Moreover, a long press allows you to toggle between transparency and ANC Mode. You can easily enable it after both the earbuds firmware update and the realme Link App update. As a result, these earbuds deliver exceptional noise cancellation. As these earbuds' audio and visuals are precisely synced, you can enjoy an entertaining gaming experience. Their Game Mode lets you play games with as little as 88ms of latency. Boasting IPX5-water resistance, these earbuds won't be damaged by drizzles or water splashes. So, grab the Realme Buds Air 3 In-Ear Active Noise Cancellation Truly Wireless Earbuds with Mic online this instant!

faqs.que: Is it worth getting wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: Yes, they are worthwhile, mainly if you are interested in fitness or travel. Wireless earphones have become much more affordable in recent years. The absence of wires allows for a more excellent range of motion and connectivity with a wide range of devices.

faqs.que: What is the lifespan of wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: You should get roughly two years out of cheap or average-quality earbuds. Best wireless earbuds can endure for four or five years if appropriately purchased. Furthermore, earbuds have a 2 - 4 year average lifespan.

faqs.que: Which is better, earbuds or AirPods?
faqs.ans: The most noticeable difference between traditional EarPods and the new AirPods would be that the AirPods are entirely wireless, while the EarPods are not. For those who had problems keeping the connected EarPods on their ears, the new AirPods are the solution.

faqs.que: Can wireless earbuds be used individually?
faqs.ans: True wireless earphones still use Bluetooth technology, but instead of being incorporated into a wire, the Bluetooth connection is built directly into each earpiece. Because the earbuds are distinct, you may use each separately or join them together for a more immersive music experience.
